item.title: 👍Melissa Stuart - City of Redmond
item.description: Melissa Stuart signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent City of Redmond.

item.title: ❓💵Mark Johnson - Washington Retail Association
item.description: Mark Johnson signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Washington Retail Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍💵Brooke Davies - Washington Beverage Association
item.description: Brooke Davies signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington Beverage Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Lynne Robinson - Mayor, City of Bellevue
item.description: Lynne Robinson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Mayor, City of Bellevue.

item.title: 👎💵Jay Balasbas - Basin Disposal and Consolidated Disposal Services Inc.
item.description: Jay Balasbas signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Basin Disposal and Consolidated Disposal Services Inc.. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎💵Vicki Christophersen - Washington Refuse and Recycling Association
item.description: Vicki Christophersen signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington Refuse and Recycling Association. They are a registered lobbyist.
